body.p: I would be obliged to you if you would ask the Gov, to appoint Joseph S Burdette a cousin of mine notary Public for Garrard County. I have him in my office & it would be a source of great convenience to me. I will pay you the fees when I come down which will be not long, please attend to this matter for me instanter. & enclose me the coms by mail.
I think we will have a lively time in the law if the Legislature does not close the Courts at its next meeting. I would like to see your & talk over old matters &c &c

Garrard Co
Notary
Jos. S. Burdett
appo. Jany 6. 1862
